doc.after: Advances in particular sciences such as archaeology gene mapping and evolutionary ecology have enabled historians to gain new insights into the early origins of humans despite the lack of written sources 2 One account suggested that proponents of Big History were trying to upend the conventional practice in historiography of relying on written records 2
